lines: Your husband has become interested in photography and has signed up for a photography class at the local high school. His assignment for this week is "candid photography." As a result, everything you do at home is accompanied by a

Yesterday morning, he snapped you just as you were rising and called the picture "Squirrel's Nest Surprise!" One afternoon while you are alone in the house, sitting on the toilet, the telephone rings.
"CLICK-WHIR-SNAP!" Your hubby has set you up. He takes a picture of you with your underwear around your knees answering the phone and calls it "Interrupted Business."

A representative from a famous magazine calls to congratulate you on your sense of humor and your desire to see your husband succeed. "Squirrel's Nest Surprise" was entered in a photo contest, and your husband has won first prize-$2000.
${spouseName} gives you half of it for being such a good model, not to mention an exceptionally good sport.
Were you afraid that your husband would ambush you and take a picture as you were hurrying out of the bathroom with your underwear around your knees?
Well, it's a good thing you didn't come out, anyway.
